server.objects

Class DiscussionSubject

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • server.objects.DiscussionSubject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, DiscussionSubjectInterface

    public class DiscussionSubject
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements DiscussionSubjectInterface
    The discussion subjects on the forum
    Author:
    Grumpy Group
